resources.name: Domains
resources.full_description: Foreman considers a domain and a DNS zone as the same thing. That is, if you are planning to manage a site where all the machines are or the form hostname.somewhere.com then the domain is somewhere.com. This allows Foreman to associate a puppet variable with a domain/site and automatically append this variable to all external node requests made by machines at that site.
